telephony_alias_change_type_subtitle: What is number configuration used for?
telephony_alias_change_type_details: Every business issue will have its own telephony solution from OVHcloud Telecom. With our VoIP solution, you can set up a strategy for receiving calls that matches your business needs: management of time slots and overflow, redirection of calls to a mobile or internal transfer, and much more. Our customers benefit from many services, while controlling their budget.
telephony_alias_change_type_info_text_1: Configure your number to your preferences.
telephony_alias_change_type_info_text_2: By default, your number is not configured and does not allow any action, but OVHcloud offers a multitude of services, from redirection to interactive voice server, through conference or call queue.
telephony_alias_change_type_warning_old_: When you change the ({{ featureType }}) configuration type to another configuration type, this cannot be undone!
telephony_alias_config_change_type_confi: By changing this configuration type, you will lose all of your current configuration
